text: This is a list of shopping malls under the SM Supermalls chain managed by the Philippine firm SM Prime. Most malls are in the Philippines, while some are in China. ==Maps== ==List== * SM North EDSA 1st sm mall in Philippines * SM City Sta. Mesa 2nd Sm mall in Philippines * SM Megamall * SM City Cebu * SM Southmall * SM City Bacoor * SM City Fairview * SM City Iloilo * SM City Manila * SM City Pampanga * SM City Sucat ==Future== * SM City J Mall * SM City Laoag * SM City La Union * SM City Zamboanga * SM City General Trias * SM City Tagum * SM City Bohol * SM City Iligan * SM City San Jose, Nueva Ecija ==References== Category:SM Prime
title: List of SM Supermalls
